categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The "inhibitor incident" was an event that occurred on the Inner Rim planet Trevura at some point between 0 BBY and 5 ABY.

The "inhibitor incident" was created for "Gun Nut," a roleplaying miniadventure for the Wizards of the Coast Star Wars Roleplaying Game written by Jeff Quick and published on Wizards.com on April 11, 2002.
